t: Lord,*spn hear my prayer. In*ln your faithfulness listen to my plea, and*ln in your righteousness answer me.
Do*ln not bring your servant into judgment, for*ln no one alive is righteous in your sight.
For*pn the enemy has pursued me, crushing*ln me to the ground, making*ln me live in darkness like*ln those long dead.
My*ln spirit is weak within me; my*ln heart is overcome with dismay.
I*pn remember the days of old; I*ln meditate on all you have done; I*ln reflect on the work of your hands.
I*ln spread out my hands to you; I*ln am like parched land before you. Selah*ig
Answer*pn me quickly, Lord;*s my*ln spirit fails. Don’t*ln hide your face from me, or*ln I will be like those going*ln down to the Pit.
Let*ln me experience your*ln faithful love in the morning, for*ln I trust in you. Reveal*ln to me the way I should go because*ln I appeal to you.
Rescue*ln me from my enemies, Lord;*s I*ln come to you for protection.
Teach*ln me to do your will, for*ln you are my God. May*ln your gracious Spirit lead*ln me on level ground.
For*pn your name’s sake, Lord,*s let*ln me live. In*ln your righteousness deliver me from trouble,
and*ln in your faithful love destroy my enemies. Wipe*ln out all those who attack me, for*ln I am your servant.
